item.title: Handling code duplication with Sass @imports in the asset pipeline
item.description: I have used the asset pipeline heavily since its release in Rails 3.1.0 over two years ago. Only recently did I run in to a handful of gotchas when it came to dealing with stylesheet compilations using Sass. I guest wrote a post about my experience using SASS in the asset pipeline at Unbounce. Head on over to the Inside Unbounce blog to check out the full post.
